cause.description:
JOIN THIS GROUP AND PRAY FOR MARTYR RAMI HAMZEH...SO GOD WILL BLESSS HIS SOUL....AND NSHALA UR GOING TO HEAVEN.... GOD BLESS U.. R.I.P RAMI.
1. THIS WAR MUST END...
2. NSHALA THE LEBANESE ARMY ARE GOING TO KILL ALL FATE7 AL ESLAMS MEMBERS...
3. ANYTHING WE CAN DO TO HELPPP EVERY SOLDIER ..
cause.name: THE MARTYR RAMI SAMIR HAMZAH
